name: Sudokubes
description:
Solve the brand new game of Sudokubes, combining the logic of sudoku puzzles and the shapes of block puzzles.

With three different difficulty levels to choose from, there’s something for when you want you need a quick and easy game to play, or to really challenge your brain and puzzle solving skills. 

All puzzles are procedurally generated, making each game different as you try and get the best time possible.
